This Board is comprised of seven residents appointed by the Village Council for a two year term. View Upcoming Meetings Meets: Last Wednesday of each month at 5:30 PM Location: Miami Shores Country Club Board Liaison: Alberto Pozzi | 305-795-2360 General Information Staff Directory Email rodriguezy@msvfl.gov Phone Numbers 305-762-4870 Emergencies: Dial 911 Location 10050 NE 2ND Avenue Miami Shores, FL 33138 Get Directions Contact Info 10050 Northeast 2nd Avenue  Miami Shores, Florida 33138 305-795-2207 Miami Shores Newsletter Signup "Don't miss out! ðŸ“© Subscribe for our Newsletter and Bid alerts HERE" Website By EvoGov

Advance booking is essential. Etiquette Softspikes required. Contact Us | Palm Tree Club Miami Skip to Content Palm Tree Club Miami (305) 865-7100 Rooms & Suites Offers Live Events Restaurant Happenings Our Neighborhood Gallery About Us Book Now Connect With Palm Tree Club Letâ€™s Hear From You! Palm Tree Club Miami 1819 79th Street Causeway North Bay Village, FL 33141 Hotel Phone: 305-865-7100 Front Desk Inquiries: reception@palmtreeclubmiami.com Reservations: r eservations@palmtreeclubmiami.com Restaurant Phone: 786-204-1366 Email: dining@palmtreeclubmiami.com Marina Email: boats@palmtreeclubmiami.com Radio Channel: #71 Live Events Email: VIP@palmtreeclubmiami.com Thank you for reaching out! We will be in touch shortly. First Name * Last Name * Email Address * Comments Privacy Policy agreement I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy . Yes, I would like to receive emails with exclusive specials and offers. Submit FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS Live Music & Events What time does the live music start? Doors open at 3 PM. Is there a cover charge for guests to enjoy the live music? Only for ticketed events. Get your tickets on Posh: https://posh.vip/g/ptc-miami . Do I need a reservation to see the live music? Not unless it's a ticketed event. How long does the live music performance last? Sunset parties typically go until 12 AM. Is the music indoors or outdoors? Both. Do you have a schedule or calendar for upcoming live music performances? Yes! Be sure to check our socials and website for more details: www.palmtreeclubmiami.com . Do you offer special deals or promotions? For offers and experiences, check our OpenTable: Palm Tree Club Miami Restaurant - North Bay Village, FL | OpenTable . Are there specific days or nights dedicated to live music? Typically Saturdays and Sundays, but please check our website for more details! What time will the DJs perform at the events we've published? Stay tuned to our social media for updates on set times. Whatâ€™s the dress code for events? Come as you areâ€”sneakers, flip-flops, heels, sequins, or bikini tops. Feel free to wear jeans, shorts, or even your suit (but we hope you lose the tie). Hotel General Information Is there a minimum age to check in? Yes, guests must be 21 years or older to check-in and will be required to present a valid photo ID, in addition to their method of payment. What time is check-in and check-out? Check-in time: 4pm Check-out time: 11am Can I check in early or check out late? Early check-in or late check-out may be available upon request, subject to availability. Please contact the front desk for more information. How late can I check-in? Our front desk is available 24 hours. What is required to check-in? Guests must be 21 years or older to check in and will be required to present a valid photo ID in addition to their method of payment. Is parking available at the hotel? Yes, complimentary on-site parking is available for all hotel guests. Can I store my luggage before or after I check out? Yes, complimentary luggage storage is available at our Front Desk. Is the hotel accessible for guests with disabilities? Yes, we have accessible rooms, ramps, and elevators for your convenience. Please inform us of any specific needs prior to your arrival. Are there any extra charges or resort fees? $20 plus taxes Resort Fee is applied to all reservations. Is the hotel pet-friendly? Yes. A non-refundable $100 pet fee applies. Room and Facilities Do the rooms include complimentary Wi-Fi? Yes, free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms and public areas of the hotel. When will my room be cleaned, and how do I request additional items? Your room will receive full cleaning service every third day of your stay. For any requests, such as extra towels or amenity refills, please contact the Front Desk at any time. Are there any amenities in the rooms? Our rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe, Bluetooth speaker, hair dryer, and ironing board. Check the room description for specific details. Do you have accessible rooms? We offer three accessible room types - our Accessible Classic King and Accessible Classic Double, Accessible Deluxe King. For more specifics, check out our Accessibility page. Is there a smoking policy in the hotel? Our hotel is smoke-free, and smoking is only allowed in designated areas. Please ensure compliance with our smoking policy. A $250 cleaning fee will be applied if any odor is found in the room. Do you offer breakfast? Brunch begins at 11am. Do you have a restaurant or bar on-site? Yes, we have Palm Tree Club Miami Restaurant. Open daily, our restaurant serves up coastal-American food in a casual dining environment, with all your favorites & Miamiâ€™s best sunset views! Do you offer laundry and dry cleaning services? Yes, laundry and dry cleaning services are available. Booking and Payments Does the hotel accept travelerâ€™s checks as payment? No, we do not accept travelerâ€™s checks as payment. Does the hotel require any deposit at check in? Yes, at check-in, we require a $150 incidental deposit per stay, in addition to the room and tax charges. This is just a hold on the credit card. If the guest doesnâ€™t incur any incidentals or make any purchases during their stay, the hold will be released within 5 to 7 business days after check-out. Does the hotel require any deposit prior to checking in? Pre-stay deposits are dependent upon the rate plan reserved. What type of credit cards are accepted at the hotel? MasterCard, Visa, American Express, and Discover are all accepted. What is your cancellation policy? Cancellation policy depends on the reservation rate booked. We offer rates with a refundable reservation up to 72 hours before arrival, as well as discounted non-refundable rates. Can I book directly on your website? Yes, we recommend booking directly through our website for the best rates and special offers. Can I modify or cancel my reservation after booking? Cancellation/Modification policy depends on the reservation rate booked. We offer rates that may be cancelled or modified up to 72 hours before arrival, as well as discounted non-refundable rates that do not allow cancellations or modifications. Special Requests and Policies Can I send a package to the hotel? Yes, weâ€™re happy to accept packages prior to your arrival. Please be sure that the name of the registered guest is included in the delivery information and be sure to use our Security/Receiving address: 1819 79th Street Causeway North Bay Village, FL 33141 Can I request special accommodations or amenities (e.g., flowers, champagne, etc.)? Yes, we can arrange special requests for a fee. Please contact us ahead of time to ensure availability. Do you offer shuttle service to the airport? We do not offer this service directly, however, our concierge services may assist in making a shuttle reservation with a 3rd party company. Additional Services Can I book tours or activities through the hotel? Yes, weâ€™d be happy to assist with booking. Please stop by the front desk to inquire about available options. Our concierge team can also help with making reservations. Do you have a gym or fitness center? Yes, we have a brand-new fitness center, and itâ€™s open 24 hours a day for your convenience! Reservations & Ticketing How can I contact the restaurant if I have further questions? You can reach us at 786-204-1366 or email us at dining@palmtreeclubmiami.com . Will there be commissions for promoters who refer clients? For more information, email VIP@palmtreeclubmiami.com . Contact Information How can I contact the hotel if I have further questions? You can reach us at 305-865-7100 or email us at reception@palmtreeclubmiami.com . Our team is available 24/7 to assist you. Join the Crew Thank you for your interest.
